title: Question about using custom riot skins?
body: You know how custom skins are allowed right? Would downloading an official skin (like Project Zed) and using it as you would a custom skin be allowed?

replies.body:
I mentioned this earlier in a similar post, but custom skins are **use at your own risk**. This is because unless you're the one who created the package/script/program that serves the skins, it's difficult to ensure there aren't *extra features* you weren't aware of. Once a program offers a competitive advantage, we're inclined to take action against it. For full details, check out our [Terms of Use. ](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/legal/termsofuse)

Let me know if you have any additional questions.
